entries.title: Diddy's lawyer says he 'can't wait' to testify in court as speculation mounts over who he'll bring down with him
entries.summary: Sean 'Diddy' Combs apparently can't wait to testify in his upcoming trial, according to his lawyer. Marc Agnifilo told TMZ of Diddy's plans to take the stand over a week after he was indicted.

entries.title: Inside the warped life of Madeleine McCann suspect Christian Brueckner: Full timeline of German paedophile's crimes and links to missing Brit toddler
entries.summary: Born Christian Fischer in Bavaria in 1976, h e descended into a life of crime as a young teenager, and was convicted of his first burglary in his home town of Wurzburg in 1992, when he was just 15.

entries.title: Elon Musk triggers ANOTHER row with Keir Starmer over race riots after being barred from UK business summit as Tories warn snubbing X owner could cost Britain a Tesla factory and thousands of jobs
entries.summary: The controversial X owner reignited his row with the Prime Minister after being denied an invite to an October investment summit over false claims he made on his platform last month.
